meanings.definition: The time at which the sun disappears below the horizon.
meanings.sent1: During the earthset, the sky turns beautiful shades of orange and pink.
meanings.sent2: I love watching the earthset from the beach every evening.
meanings.sent3: As the earthset approached, the birds chirped happily, bidding farewell to the sun.
meanings.sent4: The earthset painted the sky with a palette of colors, like an artist finishing a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The earthset was a breathtaking sight, etching a memory in my mind forever.

meanings.definition: The act of the earth setting or sinking below the horizon.
meanings.sent1: The earthset was gradual, as if the earth was slowly tucking itself in for the night.
meanings.sent2: We witnessed the earthset while camping in the mountains, feeling one with nature.
meanings.sent3: The earthset seemed to play hide-and-seek with the clouds, peeking out before disappearing completely.
meanings.sent4: The earthset was like a silent goodbye, as the world prepared for the blanket of night.
meanings.sent5: The earthset marked the end of another day, a reminder of the earth's constant motion.
